title: Static Analysis

android.permission.BIND_INPUT_METHOD.description: Allows the holder to bind to the top-level interface of an input method. Should never be needed for common applications.

android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the information about the status of Wi-Fi.

certificate_findings: Application is signed with a code signing certificate

Application is signed with v1 signature scheme, making it vulnerable to Janus vulnerability on Android 5.0-8.0, if signed only with v1 signature scheme. Applications running on Android 5.0-7.0 signed with v1, and v2/v3 scheme is also vulnerable.

manifest_analysis.title:
Application Data can be Backed up
[android:allowBackup=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: This flag allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.
manifest_analysis.name: Application Data can be Backed up [android:allowBackup=true]

manifest_analysis.title:
Service (de.onyxbits.remotekeyboard.RemoteKeyboardService) is Protected by a permission, but the protection level of the permission should be checked.
Permission: android.permission.BIND_INPUT_METHOD
[android:exported=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: A Service is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. It is protected by a permission which is not defined in the analysed application. As a result, the protection level of the permission should be checked where it is defined. If it is set to normal or dangerous, a malicious application can request and obtain the permission and interact with the component. If it is set to signature, only applications signed with the same certificate can obtain the permission.
manifest_analysis.name: is Protected by a permission, but the protection level of the permission should be checked.[android:exported=true]

manifest_analysis.title:
Broadcast Receiver (de.onyxbits.remotekeyboard.WidgetProvider) is not Protected.
An intent-filter exists.
manifest_analysis.desc: A Broadcast Receiver is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. The presence of intent-filter indicates that the Broadcast Receiver is explicitly exported.
manifest_analysis.name: is not Protected.An intent-filter exists.

metadata.cwe: CWE-532: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File
metadata.description: The App logs information. Sensitive information should never be logged.

metadata.cwe: CWE-312: Cleartext Storage of Sensitive Information
metadata.description: Files may contain hardcoded sensitive information like usernames, passwords, keys etc.

metadata.cwe: CWE-89: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection')
metadata.description: App uses SQLite Database and execute raw SQL query. Untrusted user input in raw SQL queries can cause SQL Injection. Also sensitive information should be encrypted and written to the database.

FCS_STO_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does not store any credentials to non-volatile memory.

FCS_CKM_EXT.1.1.choice: The application generate no asymmetric cryptographic keys.

FDP_DEC_EXT.1.1.choice: The application has access to ['network connectivity'].

FDP_DEC_EXT.1.2.choice: The application has access to no sensitive information repositories.

FDP_NET_EXT.1.1.choice: The application has user/application initiated network communications.

FDP_DAR_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does not encrypt files in non-volatile memory.

FMT_MEC_EXT.1.1.choice: The application invoke the mechanisms recommended by the platform vendor for storing and setting configuration options.

FTP_DIT_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does not encrypt any data in traffic or does not transmit any data between itself and another trusted IT product.

strings:
"msg_rate" : "Hi,
ist Remote Keyboard nützlich? Wenn ja, dann wäre eine Bewertung auf Google Play sehr willkommen. Eine Bewertung schreiben?"

"app_quickinstuctions" : "Remote Keyboard muss als Eingabemethode festgelegt werden. Danach kann der Dienst durch berühren eines beliebigen Textfelded gestartet werden. Um zu tippen, muss eine Netzwerkverbindung zwischen PC und Android Gerät über das Telnet Protokoll hergestellt werden. Remote Keyboard wartet auf Verbindungen auf Port 2323 von IP Adresse %1$s."

"app_quickinstuctions" : "Set Remote Keyboard as your input method, then touch any textfield to activate it. To actually type, connect to your device with a telnet client from your desktop computer. Remote Keyboard is listening for connections on port 2323 of host %1$s."
"err_notenabled" : "Remote Keyboard is not enabled as an inputmethod. Open system settings to enable it now?"

"msg_rate" : "Hi,
seems like you find this app useful. Would you consider rating it? This will only take a minute of your time, but encourages further development."
"err_notenabled" : "Remote Keyboard ist nicht als Eingabemethode aktiviert. Systemeinstellungen öffnen?"
"msg_really_delete" : "Do you really want to remove all entries from the list?"
"no_replacements" : "No word substitutions defined. Use the plus symbol to add one."

high.title: Application vulnerable to Janus Vulnerability
high.description: Application is signed with v1 signature scheme, making it vulnerable to Janus vulnerability on Android 5.0-8.0, if signed only with v1 signature scheme. Applications running on Android 5.0-7.0 signed with v1, and v2/v3 scheme is also vulnerable.

warning.title: Application Data can be Backed up
warning.description:
[android:allowBackup=true]
This flag allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.

warning.title: Service (de.onyxbits.remotekeyboard.RemoteKeyboardService) is Protected by a permission, but the protection level of the permission should be checked.
warning.description:
Permission: android.permission.BIND_INPUT_METHOD [android:exported=true]
A Service is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. It is protected by a permission which is not defined in the analysed application. As a result, the protection level of the permission should be checked where it is defined. If it is set to normal or dangerous, a malicious application can request and obtain the permission and interact with the component. If it is set to signature, only applications signed with the same certificate can obtain the permission.

warning.title: Broadcast Receiver (de.onyxbits.remotekeyboard.WidgetProvider) is not Protected.
warning.description:
An intent-filter exists.
A Broadcast Receiver is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. The presence of intent-filter indicates that the Broadcast Receiver is explicitly exported.

warning.title: Files may contain hardcoded sensitive information like usernames, passwords, keys etc.
warning.description:
Files may contain hardcoded sensitive information like usernames, passwords, keys etc.
https://github.com/MobSF/owasp-mstg/blob/master/Document/0x05d-Testing-Data-Storage.md#checking-memory-for-sensitive-data-mstg-storage-10

warning.title: App uses SQLite Database and execute raw SQL query. Untrusted user input in raw SQL queries can cause SQL Injection. Also sensitive information should be encrypted and written to the database.
warning.description:
App uses SQLite Database and execute raw SQL query. Untrusted user input in raw SQL queries can cause SQL Injection. Also sensitive information should be encrypted and written to the database.
https://github.com/MobSF/owasp-mstg/blob/master/Document/0x04h-Testing-Code-Quality.md#injection-flaws-mstg-arch-2-and-mstg-platform-2

warning.title: This app may contain hardcoded secrets
